scripts.start:payments: ./scripts/run-localstack && yarn create:ps && yarn create:app && yarn log
scripts.test: LOGGING_LEVEL=fatal NO_CACHE=1 TESTS=true NO_LOG_FILTER=1 AWS_REGION=us-east-2 WS_XRAY_CONTEXT_MISSING=LOG_ERROR FDC_REVERSAL_TIMEOUT=1 RETRY_SLEEP_INTERVAL=1 TEST_MODE=true yarn jest --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:detect-memory-leaks: LOGGING_LEVEL=fatal NO_CACHE=1 TESTS=true NO_LOG_FILTER=1 AWS_REGION=us-east-2 WS_XRAY_CONTEXT_MISSING=LOG_ERROR FDC_REVERSAL_TIMEOUT=1 RETRY_SLEEP_INTERVAL=1 STAGE=dev TEST_MODE=false node --max_old_space_size=4096 --expose-gc ./node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand --passWithNoTests --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --logHeapUsage --detectLeaks --config .jest.json
scripts.test:ps-app: yarn build && lerna exec 'sls invoke test' --scope ps-applications
scripts.test:ps-transaction: yarn build && lerna exec 'sls invoke test' --scope ps-transactions
scripts.test:pv: yarn build && lerna exec 'sls invoke test' --scope pan-vault
scripts.release: lerna-semantic-release pre && lerna-semantic-release perform && lerna-semantic-release post
scripts.docs:lint: documentation lint documentation.yml packages/*/src/ packages/*/index.js packages/*/handler.js functions/*/src/ functions/*/index.js functions/*/handler.js
scripts.docs:serve: documentation serve -w -c documentation.yml packages/*/src/ packages/*/index.js packages/*/handler.js functions/*/src/ functions/*/index.js functions/*/handler.js
scripts.docs:build: documentation build -c documentation.yml packages/*/src/ packages/*/index.js packages/*/handler.js functions/*/src/ functions/*/index.js functions/*/handler.js
